actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit the State of Hawaii to use the proceeds from the sale, lease, or other disposition of certain real property for any public purpose.

summary.text: Permits the State of Hawaii to use the proceeds from the sale, lease, or other disposition of real property at Sand Island, Hawaii, for any public purpose.

titles.title: A bill to permit the State of Hawaii to use the proceeds from the sale, lease, or other disposition of certain real property for any public purpose.
